Package Delivery

Class OrdinaryTruck

  • java.lang.Object
    • Delivery.Truck
      • Delivery.OrdinaryTruck

  • public class OrdinaryTruck
extends Truck
    An OrdinaryTruck can hold items which don't require temperature control.
    Author:
    Chris

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      OrdinaryTruck​()
      Construct an Ordinary Truck.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      double getCost​()
      Calculate and return the cost of the truck using the following formula:
      w + 750 + 0.25q
      Where w is the wholesale cost of all items in the truck and q is the amount of items in the truck.
      java.lang.String getTypeToString​()
      String representation of the type of truck of the concrete class.
      void loadCargo​(Item item)
      Load an item into the truck.
      void loadCargo​(Item item, int quantity)
      Load multiple of the same item into the truck.
      void loadCargo​(Stock stock)
      Load stock into the truck.

    • Constructor Detail

      • OrdinaryTruck

        public OrdinaryTruck​()
        Construct an Ordinary Truck.

    • Method Detail

      • loadCargo

        public void loadCargo​(Item item)
               throws DeliveryException
        Load an item into the truck. If the item requires temperature control, raise an exception as refrigerated items may not be held by an OrdinaryTruck.
        Overrides:
        loadCargo in class Truck
        Throws:
        StockException - if the item requires temperature control.
        DeliveryException - if the truck will exceed capacity.

      • loadCargo

        public void loadCargo​(Stock stock)
               throws DeliveryException
        Load stock into the truck. If an item requires refrigeration, raise an exception as refrigerated items may not be held by an OrdinaryTruck.
        Overrides:
        loadCargo in class Truck
        Throws:
        StockException
        DeliveryException - if truck will exceed capacity.

      • loadCargo

        public void loadCargo​(Item item,
                      int quantity)
               throws DeliveryException
        Load multiple of the same item into the truck. if the item requires temperature control a DeliveryException will be thrown.
        Overrides:
        loadCargo in class Truck
        Parameters:
        item - To load into the truck
        quantity - Quantity of specified item to be added to the truck.
        Throws:
        DeliveryException - if truck will exceed capacity.

      • getCost

        public double getCost​()
        Calculate and return the cost of the truck using the following formula:
        w + 750 + 0.25q
        Where w is the wholesale cost of all items in the truck and q is the amount of items in the truck.
        Specified by:
        getCost in class Truck
        Returns:
        cost of truck in Dollars

        public java.lang.String getTypeToString​()
        Description copied from class: Truck
        String representation of the type of truck of the concrete class.
        Specified by:
        getTypeToString in class Truck
        Returns:
        String
